title: REMOVE HOURGLASS AND IGNITE FROM URF or make them less spamable
body: hourglass and ignite are ruining urf all i see is people just igniting for kills and just spaming hourglass to avoid death either they are removed or given longer CD to be less spamable and easier to deal with

replies.body: Remove two things that reduce the winrate of zero-skill clickertrash like jax and yi from 100% down to 80% or so?

You should be complaining about barrier, wat
